title: Israel launches ground offensive in Gaza City with residents warned to evacuate - latest updates
summary: The IDF has announced that it is in the process of dismantling Hamas' infrastructure in Gaza City. Residents have been warned that staying in the area poses a danger to their safety. The military operation aims to reduce Hamas' capabilities in the region.

title: World Athletics Championships 2025: women’s 1500m, men’s 110m hurdles and more – live
summary: Catch the highlights from the fourth evening of events in Tokyo, featuring insights and updates. Daniel Harris provides the latest news and developments from the ongoing action. Stay informed on all the key moments and performances.

title: 3,500 drones launched at Ukraine this month, Zelenskyy says, as he calls for Trump to take ‘clear position’ on Russia — Europe live
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky emphasizes the need for sanctions and security guarantees as essential components for achieving peace. This statement comes ahead of former President Trump's upcoming visit to the UK. Zelensky highlights these elements as "missing pieces" in the ongoing efforts to stabilize Ukraine.

title: Trump accuses NYT of being ‘mouthpiece’ for Democratic party as he announces defamation action — US politics live
summary: U.S. President criticized a publication as one of the "worst and most degenerate newspapers" in the country in a Truth Social post. Meanwhile, Vance and Miller revealed plans to target "far left" groups. The remarks reflect a wider political struggle and ongoing tensions regarding media and political ideologies.

title: Surrey v Nottinghamshire, Sussex v Yorkshire, and more: county cricket, day two – live
summary: Tanya Aldred will provide updates on the most recent County Championship fixtures. The coverage aims to keep fans informed about match outcomes and highlights. Stay tuned for insights and analysis of the games.
